item.title: 部长称马克龙下周将在美国会谈中为欧洲辩护
item.description: 一位法国部长表示，法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙下周在华盛顿会见美国总统唐纳德-特朗普时将捍卫欧洲在乌克兰问题上的利益。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron will defend Europe’s interests regarding Ukraine when he meets US President Donald Trump in Washington next week, a French minister said.】

item.title: 欧洲银行将迎来 1997 年以来的最佳连胜期
item.description: 欧洲银行在财报季中一帆风顺，并承诺进行大规模股票回购，为其自 1997 年以来的最佳连胜势头再添一把火。【原文：European banks have sailed through the earnings season and are promising massive share buybacks, adding fuel to their best winning streak since 1997.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯 SMC 计划在最新医疗保健产品发行中进行首次公开募股
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯的 SMC 医院正计划在利雅得进行首次公开募股，加入沙特医疗保健公司上市的行列。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s SMC Hospitals is planning an initial public offering in Riyadh, joining the host of health-care firms going public in the kingdom.】

item.title: 英美资源集团再遭戴比尔斯公司减记，利润下滑
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）再次对陷入困境的戴比尔斯钻石公司（De Beers）进行减值，并公布利润下滑，该矿业公司正在对其业务进行彻底改革。【原文：Anglo American Plc took another writedown on its struggling De Beers diamond unit, and posted a slide in profit, as the miner moves ahead with a radical overhaul of its business.】

item.title: 全球最大矿商因铁矿石的中国问题而陷入困境
item.description: 世界上最大的矿商曾一度从中国对铁矿石的巨大需求中获利，如今却开始受到其主要客户经济困境的影响。【原文：The world’s biggest miners, having cashed in on China’s once-rampant demand for iron ore, are starting to reel from the impact of their main customer’s economic struggles.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市小幅反弹，英镑维持在 1.26 美元附近
新加坡 Abaxx 交易所计划推出黄金期货，因黄金价格飙升
item.description: 新加坡阿巴克斯交易所（Abaxx Exchange）计划在未来几个月内推出黄金期货，今年以来，随着交易商努力应对主要金银枢纽的中断和避风港需求的增加，黄金价格创下了新的纪录。【原文：Singapore’s Abaxx Exchange plans to introduce gold futures in the coming months, with prices setting fresh records this year as traders grapple with disruptions in key bullion hubs and increased haven demand.】

item.title: 特朗普的加沙计划引发不确定性，埃及将维持利率不变
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易关税和有争议的将巴勒斯坦人迁出加沙的提议激起了经济的不确定性，埃及可能将推迟开始其期待已久的货币宽松周期。【原文：Egypt will probably delay the start of its long-awaited monetary-easing cycle, as Donald Trump’s trade tariffs and controversial proposal to relocate Palestinians from Gaza stoke economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 肯尼亚今年旅游业收入将增长 24%，达到 43 亿美元
item.description: 旅游业是肯尼亚的主要外汇来源之一，肯尼亚预计今年旅游业收入将激增 24%，达到 5600 亿先令（43.3 亿美元）。【原文：Kenya expects earnings from tourism, one of the nation’s main sources of foreign currency, will surge 24% to 560 billion shillings ($4.33 billion) this year.】

item.title: 调查显示，计划涨薪的日本企业比例创历史新高
item.description: 帝国数据库（Teikoku Databank）的一项调查显示，超过 60% 的日本公司计划在明年提高工人工资，以招聘和留住员工，这一比例创下历史新高。【原文：More than 60% of Japanese companies — a record high percentage — plan to raise workers’ wages next year as they fight to recruit and retain staff, according to a survey by Teikoku Databank.】

item.title: 泰本将通过长期基金返还外部资本
item.description: 泰本资本管理公司（Tybourne Capital Management）在关闭其美国技术对冲基金后不久，又进一步退出了为客户管理公开市场投资的业务。【原文：Tybourne Capital Management is further retreating from the business of managing public market investments for clients, shortly after closing its US technology hedge fund.】

item.title: 摩洛哥计划两年来首次对外出售欧元债券
item.description: 摩洛哥正计划自 2023 年以来首次在国际市场上出售债券，因为在 2030 年共同举办世界杯足球赛之前，摩洛哥正准备进行代价高昂的改革和数十亿美元的大笔支出。【原文：Morocco is planning to sell bonds on the international market for the first time since 2023 as it readies costly reforms and a multi-billion dollar spending spree ahead of co-hosting the football World Cup in 2030.】

item.title: 金田公司利润因金银价格和产量反弹而飙升
item.description: 金田公司（Gold Fields Ltd.）表示，由于金银价格飙升，公司开始克服智利和南非矿山的运营挑战，全年利润激增 77%。【原文：Gold Fields Ltd. said full-year profit surged 77% as the price of bullion soared and it started to overcome operational challenges at mines in Chile and South Africa.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行不认同市场对降息路径的信心：问与答
item.description: 澳大利亚央行副行长安德鲁-豪瑟（Andrew Hauser）周四在接受彭博社采访时表示，澳大利亚央行仍有 "工作要做"，才能使通胀率回到2%-3%的目标，而且市场对降息轨迹还没有信心。【原文：Australia’s central bank still has “work to do” to bring inflation back to its 2-3% target and doesn’t yet share the market’s confidence about the trajectory of interest-rate cuts, Deputy Governor Andrew Hauser told Bloomberg in an interview Thursday.】

item.title: 印度小麦作物面临收获前温暖天气的威胁
item.description: 印度本月将面临更加温暖的天气和稀少的降雨，这将威胁到该国的小麦作物，并提高了政府削减或取消谷物进口税的可能性。【原文：India is facing more warm weather and sparse rain this month, threatening the nation’s wheat crop and raising the prospect of the government cutting or removing an import duty on the grain.】

item.title: 韦丹塔债权人批准将印度业务拆分为五个单位
item.description: 韦丹塔公司（Vedanta Ltd. ）的债权人和股东批准了一项长期计划，将这家印度矿业集团拆分为五家企业，这一举措将简化该集团的结构并减轻其债务负担。【原文：Vedanta Ltd.’s creditors and shareholders approved a long-standing plan to split the Indian mining conglomerate into five businesses, a step that will simplify the group’s structure and reduce its debt burden.】

item.title: DeepSeek 少了 Moby，多了 Wannabe？
item.description:
人工智能的后起之秀鲸鱼在市场上引起的轰动正逐渐被大科技公司的老牌利维坦所侵蚀。【原文：

The market splash made by AI’s upstart whale is steadily being erased by Big Tech’s established leviathans.

】

item.title: 英格兰银行掘金者应对特朗普掀起的狂潮
item.description:
在伦敦城街道深处的一个地下金库中，一个小团队正在匆忙赶制交易员的订单，以便将他们的金块转移到纽约。【原文：

In a subterranean vault deep under the streets of the City of London, a small team is rushing to keep up with traders' orders to move their bullion to New York. 

】

item.title: 英国最经济实惠的住宅在哪里？
item.description:
Skipton集团首席执行官斯图尔特-海尔（Stuart Haire）在本周的《In the City》节目中给出了答案。【原文：

Skipton Group chief executive Stuart Haire has the answer on this week’s episode of In the City. 

】

item.title: 德国风险投资公司 HV Capital 在英国增聘两名合伙人
item.description: HV Capital 是一家德国风险投资公司，曾为该国一些最成功的消费技术初创企业提供过支持，该公司将增加两名合伙人，并在英国开设第一家办事处。【原文：HV Capital, a German venture capital firm that has backed some of the country’s most successful consumer technology startups, is adding two partners and opening its first office in the UK.】

item.title: 尼日利亚央行暂停积极加息行动
item.description: 尼日利亚央行可能将在周四晚些时候维持利率稳定，暂停激进的紧缩周期，因为在数据计算方法修订后，通胀急剧放缓。【原文：Nigeria’s central bank will probably hold interest rates steady later on Thursday, pausing an aggressive tightening cycle after inflation slowed sharply following a revision to how the data is calculated.】

item.title: 日本央行上田与石破茂举行例会讨论经济问题
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫表示，在下周召开20国集团会议之前，他与首相石破茂举行了例行会议，就经济和金融市场交换了意见。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda said he held a regular meeting with Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba to exchange views on the economy and financial markets ahead of a Group of 20 meeting next week.】

item.title: 传送带寿司连锁店将因股东福利而大涨
item.description: 日本传送带寿司店运营商库拉寿司公司（Kura Sushi Inc.【原文：Shares of Kura Sushi Inc., an operator of conveyor-belt sushi restaurants in Japan, are set to surge after the company said that it will resume offering perks to investors.】

item.title: 新加坡汽车通行证、主权财富基金助力盈余
item.description: 根据本周二公布的预算数据，新加坡政府从接近历史最高水平的汽车许可证拍卖、所得税和国家财富基金捐款中获得的资金比最初预期的多数十亿美元。【原文：The Singapore government sourced billions of dollars more than it initially expected from the auction of near-record high car permits, income tax and contributions from its state wealth funds, according to budget data released on Tuesday.】

item.title: 人工智能助推个人电脑复苏，联想利润超出预期
item.description: 联想集团有限公司（Lenovo Group Ltd.）的季度利润超出预期，凸显了人工智能基础设施支出正在如何帮助全球个人电脑市场走出长达数年的低谷。【原文：Lenovo Group Ltd.’s quarterly profit beat projections, highlighting how AI infrastructure spending is helping pull the global PC market out of a years-long funk.】

item.title: Blackstone 旗下 Airtrunk 计划发行 ABS 债券以推动亚洲增长
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 正考虑利用资产支持证券市场为其去年收购的澳大利亚约会中心公司 AirTrunk Pte. 的扩张计划提供资金。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is considering tapping the asset-backed securities market to fund the expansion plans of AirTrunk Pte., an Australia-based date center firm that it acquired last year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 创纪录的美国液化天然气出口或将缓解欧洲和亚洲买家的压力
item.description: 随着新项目产量的增加，美国的液化天然气出口继续刷新纪录，这一趋势可能有助于缓解欧洲和亚洲的高价格。【原文：US liquefied natural gas exports have extended a record-breaking run as new projects increased production, a trend that could help to ease high prices in Europe and Asia.】

item.title: 马歇尔-韦斯、DE Shaw、千禧年助推中国 ADR 激增
item.description: 据公开文件显示，自9月份以来，全球经理人Marshall Wace、DE Shaw & Co.和千禧管理公司（Millennium Management）帮助推动了在美国上市的中国公司股价以两位数至三位数的速度飙升。【原文：Global managers Marshall Wace, DE Shaw & Co. and Millennium Management helped propel double- to triple-digit share price surges in US-listed Chinese companies since September, according to public filings.】

item.title: 矿产商皮尔巴拉看到中国矿山重启带来的锂需求反弹
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的纯锂生产商皮尔巴拉矿业有限公司（Pilbara Minerals Ltd.）表示，随着中国一个大型矿山和精炼厂的重新开工，该公司的需求将有所恢复，尽管该公司在半年财报中出现了净亏损。【原文：Australia’s largest pure-play lithium producer Pilbara Minerals Ltd. said it sees demand recovering on the restart of a large mine and refinery in China, even as it reported a net loss in its half-year earnings.】

item.title: 贸易部长吴邦国表示，特朗普对加拿大征收关税 "毫无意义
item.description: 加拿大贸易部长玛丽-吴（Mary Ng）表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税只会让美国人的商品更加昂贵，她重申，如果加拿大最大的贸易伙伴继续征收进口关税，加拿大将誓言报复。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariffs only make goods more expensive for Americans, said Canada’s Trade Minister Mary Ng, reiterating a vow to retaliate if the country’s largest trading partner goes forward with import duties.】
